chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:


Goal:
forall m : preDTA, predta_produit_4_def m -> forall m0 : preDTA, predta_produit_4_def m0 -> predta_produit_4_def (M2 state m m0)

Premises:
preDTA = Map state : Set
M2 : forall A : Type, Map A -> Map A -> Map A
predta_produit_4_def = fun d0 : preDTA => forall (a a0 : ad) (s s0 : state), MapGet state (preDTA_produit_r a0 s0 d0) a = Some s -> exists (a1 a2 : ad) (s1 s2 : state), a = iad_conv a1 a2 /\ MapGet state (M1 state a0 s0) a2 = Some s1 /\ MapGet state d0 a1 = Some s2 : preDTA -> Prop
state = Map prec_list : Set
predta_produit_3_2 : forall m : preDTA, predta_produit_3_def m -> forall m0 : preDTA, predta_produit_3_def m0 -> predta_produit_3_def (M2 state m m0)
predta_produit_1_2 : forall m : preDTA, predta_produit_1_def m -> forall m0 : preDTA, predta_produit_1_def m0 -> predta_produit_1_def (M2 state m m0)
predta_produit_0_2 : forall m : preDTA, predta_produit_0d_def m -> forall m0 : preDTA, predta_produit_0d_def m0 -> predta_produit_0d_def (M2 state m m0)
predta_compatible_compat_2 : forall m : Map state, predta_compatible_compat_def m -> forall m0 : Map state, predta_compatible_compat_def m0 -> predta_compatible_compat_def (M2 state m m0)
sproductr_1_2 : forall m : state, sproductr_1_def m -> forall m0 : state, sproductr_1_def m0 -> sproductr_1_def (M2 prec_list m m0)
sproductl_1_2 : forall m : state, sproductl_1_def m -> forall m0 : state, sproductl_1_def m0 -> sproductl_1_def (M2 prec_list m m0)
sproductr_0_2 : forall m : state, sproductr_0_def m -> forall m0 : state, sproductr_0_def m0 -> sproductr_0_def (M2 prec_list m m0)
sproductl_0_2 : forall m : state, sproductl_0_def m -> forall m0 : state, sproductl_0_def m0 -> sproductl_0_def (M2 prec_list m m0)
st_compatible_compat_2 : forall m : Map prec_list, st_compatible_compat_def m -> forall m0 : Map prec_list, st_compatible_compat_def m0 -> st_compatible_compat_def (M2 prec_list m m0)
predta_produit_4_1 : forall (a : ad) (a0 : state), predta_produit_4_def (M1 state a a0)
Map_rec : forall (A : Type) (P : Map A -> Set), P (M0 A) -> (forall (a : ad) (a0 : A), P (M1 A a a0)) -> (forall m : Map A, P m -> forall m0 : Map A, P m0 -> P (M2 A m m0)) -> forall m : Map A, P m
Map_rect : forall (A : Type) (P : Map A -> Type), P (M0 A) -> (forall (a : ad) (a0 : A), P (M1 A a a0)) -> (forall m : Map A, P m -> forall m0 : Map A, P m0 -> P (M2 A m m0)) -> forall m : Map A, P m
Map_ind : forall (A : Type) (P : Map A -> Prop), P (M0 A) -> (forall (a : ad) (a0 : A), P (M1 A a a0)) -> (forall m : Map A, P m -> forall m0 : Map A, P m0 -> P (M2 A m m0)) -> forall m : Map A, P m
predta_produit_3_3 : forall m : preDTA, predta_produit_3_def m
predta_produit_0_3 : forall m : preDTA, predta_produit_0d_def m
predta_produit_1_3 : forall m : preDTA, predta_produit_1_def m
borne_1_2 : forall (m0 m1 : Map state) (s : state), (state_in_dta m0 s -> taille_1 s <= DTA_taille m0) -> (state_in_dta m1 s -> taille_1 s <= DTA_taille m1) -> state_in_dta (M2 state m0 m1) s -> taille_1 s <= DTA_taille (M2 state m0 m1)
borne_0_2 : forall (m0 m1 : Map prec_list) (p : prec_list), (prec_in_state m0 p -> taille_0 p <= taille_1 m0) -> (prec_in_state m1 p -> taille_0 p <= taille_1 m1) -> prec_in_state (M2 prec_list m0 m1) p -> taille_0 p <= taille_1 (M2 prec_list m0 m1)
MapGet_M2_bit_0_0 : forall (A : Type) (a : ad), N.odd a = false -> forall m m' : Map A, MapGet A (M2 A m m') a = MapGet A m (N.div2 a)
Nat.le_trans : forall n m p : nat, n <= m -> m <= p -> n <= p
mapcanon_ind : forall (A : Type) (P : Map A -> Prop), P (M0 A) -> (forall (a : ad) (y : A), P (M1 A a y)) -> (forall m1 m2 : Map A, mapcanon A m1 -> P m1 -> mapcanon A m2 -> P m2 -> 2 <= MapCard A (M2 A m1 m2) -> P (M2 A m1 m2)) -> forall m : Map A, mapcanon A m -> P m
M2_eqmap_1 : forall (A : Type) (m0 m1 m2 m3 : Map A), eqmap A (M2 A m0 m1) (M2 A m2 m3) -> eqmap A m0 m2
plus_le_compat : forall n m p q : nat, n <= m -> p <= q -> n + p <= m + q
le_mult_mult : forall n m p q : nat, n <= m -> p <= q -> n * p <= m * q
MapGet_M2_bit_0_1 : forall (A : Type) (a : ad), N.odd a = true -> forall m m' : Map A, MapGet A (M2 A m m') a = MapGet A m' (N.div2 a)
MapDisjoint_M2 : forall (A B : Type) (m0 m1 : Map A) (m2 m3 : Map B), MapDisjoint A B m0 m2 -> MapDisjoint A B m1 m3 -> MapDisjoint A B (M2 A m0 m1) (M2 B m2 m3)
MapDisjoint_M2_l : forall (A B : Type) (m0 m1 : Map A) (m2 m3 : Map B), MapDisjoint A B (M2 A m0 m1) (M2 B m2 m3) -> MapDisjoint A B m0 m2
invar_term = fun t : term => forall (n m : nat) (d : preDTA) (a : ad), rec_term d a t n = true -> n <= m -> rec_term d a t m = true : term -> Prop
MapGet_M2_both_None : forall (A : Type) (m m' : Map A) (a : ad), MapGet A m (N.div2 a) = None -> MapGet A m' (N.div2 a) = None -> MapGet A (M2 A m m') a = None
predta_compatible_compat : forall d0 d1 : preDTA, predta_compatible d0 d1 -> dta_compat d0 d1
le_max_r : forall n m : nat, m <= Nat.max n m
M2_eqmap_2 : forall (A : Type) (m0 m1 m2 m3 : Map A), eqmap A (M2 A m0 m1) (M2 A m2 m3) -> eqmap A m1 m3
predta_compatible_compat_def = fun d0 : preDTA => forall d1 : preDTA, predta_compatible d0 d1 -> dta_compat d0 d1 : preDTA -> Prop
makeM2_M2 : forall (A : Type) (m m' : Map A), eqm A (MapGet A (makeM2 A m m')) (MapGet A (M2 A m m'))
MapDisjoint_M2_r : forall (A B : Type) (m0 m1 : Map A) (m2 m3 : Map B), MapDisjoint A B (M2 A m0 m1) (M2 B m2 m3) -> MapDisjoint A B m1 m3
le_max_l : forall n m : nat, n <= Nat.max n m
in_M2_disj : forall (A : Set) (a : A) (m0 m1 : Map A), (exists c : ad, MapGet A (M2 A m0 m1) c = Some a) -> (exists c : ad, MapGet A m0 c = Some a) \/ (exists c : ad, MapGet A m1 c = Some a)
Map2_semantics_1_eq : forall (A : Type) (m m' : Map A) (f : ad -> option A), eqm A (MapGet A (M2 A m m')) f -> eqm A (MapGet A m) (fun a : ad => f (N.double a))
Map2_semantics_2_eq : forall (A : Type) (m m' : Map A) (f : ad -> option A), eqm A (MapGet A (M2 A m m')) f -> eqm A (MapGet A m') (fun a : ad => f (N.succ_double a))
Inductive pl_path_recon : preDTA -> term_list -> pl_path -> Prop := pl_path_rec_nil : forall d : preDTA, pl_path_recon d tnil pl_path_nil | pl_path_rec_cons : forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term) (plp : pl_path) (tl : term_list), reconnaissance d a t -> pl_path_recon d tl plp -> pl_path_recon d (tcons t tl) (pl_path_cons a plp)

```    
intros m H1 m0 H2 a a0 s s0 H3.
unfold predta_produit_4_def in *.
intros H4.
apply H1 in H4.
destruct H4 as [a1 [a2 [s1 [s2 [H5 [H6 H7]]]]]].
exists a1, a2, s1, s2.
split.
+ exact H5.
+ split.
  - exact H6.
  - exact (H2 _ _ _ _ H7).
```

original: intros m H1 m0 H2 a a0 s s0 H3. unfold predta_produit_4_def in *. intros H4. apply H1 in H4. destruct H4 as [a1 [a2 [s1 [s2 [H5 [H6 H7]]]]]]. exists a1, a2, s1, s2. split. + apply H5. + split. - apply H6. - apply (H2 _ _ _ _ H7).
